name: ACT Media
overview: ACTMedia, division of Amulya Infotech, is a professional Outsource Image Processing, Web design, Web Development & E-Marketing (SEO) team in India, providing a full range of web services to the SMEs & enterprises. ACTMedia adheres to ISO 9001:2008 International Quality standards and we have extensive documentation of all our work, maintain an internal knowledge base and work on continual improvement leading to Customer Satisfaction. ACTMedia has recently worked with a leading Media company in US on an Image Processing & Internet Research project and has successfully delivered about 50,000 Images within 2 months. ACTMedia has experience in creating Still Panoramic Images and also making QTVR movies. Graphic Design division specializes in Corporate Identity Design (including Company Logo Design, Brochure & Banner Design and Business cards). ACTMedia has created corporate CD multimedia presentations, Flash Introductions for corporate presentations & Web Templates. ACT Media gives any business website, a unique presence while keeping it simple and cost effective.
